DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer age range 2050years weight range exceed Â±20 % ideal weight . Ideal weight = [ height 100 ] *0.9 Subjects history significant chronic disease Judged good health basis vital sign , ECG , physical exam routine laboratory data Available entire study period Willing adhere protocol requirement sign inform consent form . Subjects take drug induce inhibit hepatic enzyme activity within 30days prior drug administration Subjects symptom acute illness within 4 week prior drug administration Subjects history clinically significant allergy include drug allergy Subjects whose clinical laboratory test value outside accept normal range ( Especially , AST ALT > 1.25 time normal range total bilirubin > 1.5times normal range ) Subjects history drug , caffeine alcohol abuse ( caffeine drink > 5cups /day , alcohol > 30g/day ) Heavy smoker ( > 10cigarettes/day ) Subjects diet know interfere absorption , distribution , metabolism excretion drug ( especially , consumption grapefruit juice ) Subjects donate plasma within 60days prior drug administration Subjects participate clinical study within 90days prior drug administration Subjects receive drug might confound result trial opinion principal investigator ( cimetidine within 7days prior drug administration ) Female subject pregnant , breastfeed use medically acceptable birth control
